description: Notification to the OAM function of the Neighbour Relation Table. OAM is
periodically updated with Neighbour Relation snapshot.
Please refer to DESCRIPTION of NeighbourRelationMatrix for packing
details. The packing elements of NeighbourRelationMatrix have raw
information about the neighbouring cells.
This raw information can be used to rank the measured cells on the basis
of relative signal strengths of the measured neighbouring cells.
The RSSI based ranking can illustrate the relative signal strengths of
the measured cells or the extent of coverage overlap between cells and
the most overlapping cells can be selected foe defining new target
adjacencies or deleting existing ones.
The notification shall have the neighbour relation stats for all
neighbouring carrier frequencies that have been reported once in the
measurement interval.
If available by the Network Listen Function, the Location Area Code and
the Neighbour Cell-ID shall carry valid values. -1 is carried by Location
Area Code and Neighbour Cell-ID, if the two are NOT present since the
Network Listen procedure was carried out.

event.Summary: OAM neighbor relationship table updated. Neighbor Relation Matrix: $v2

description: Only used by NOTIFICATION.
BTS cell identity of the serving Cell-ID.
variables.name: VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranNotifyAccessSourceCellId

description: Only used by NOTIFICATION.
Neighbour relation data set is collected of atrributes from the
Measurement Reports and Network Listen function.
The data set of represented as OCTET STRING.
Within the OCTET STRING is a SEQUENCE OF { ARFCN, BSIC, RSSI Bin#1 count
RSSI Bin#2 count, RSSI Bin#3 count, RSSI Bin#4 count, RSSI Bin#5 count
RSSI Bin#6 count, Average RSSI, LAC, Neighbour Cell-ID } for all its
neighbours found in the reporting period.
The format of objects inside NeighbourRelationMatrix is as follows:
ARFCN, BSIC and RSSI Bin#N are unsigned. Valid LAC and Cell-ID are
unsigned. LAC and Cell-ID shall hold a value of -1, if they
are NOT available for the specific neighbouring cell. Numbers and strings
appear with their high-order bytes leading.
The following is an attempt to represent
vanuSmartNetworkGeranNotifyAccessNeighbourRelationMatrix:
NeighbourRelationMatrix ::= SEQUENCE of NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry
NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry ::= SEQUENCE
NotifyAccessSourceCellId Integer32(0..65535)
NeighbourMeasurementStatsCarrierFrequency Integer32(0..1023)
NeighbourMeasurementStatsBsic Integer32(-1..63)
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin1Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin2Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin3Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin4Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin5Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsRssiBin6Count Counter32
NeighbourMeasurementStatsAverageRssi Integer32
NotifyAccessNeighbourLocationAreaCode Integer32(-1..65534)
NotifyAccessNeighbourCellId Integer32(-1..65535)
The neighbour relation matrix shall have NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry for
every neighbour. Each element in the NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry is
delimited with a ';'.
NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry shall be repeated for every neighbour cell.
Each NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry is delimited with a ':'.
There can be a max of 16 NeighbourRelationMatrixEntry in
NeighbourRelationMatrix representation.
variables.name: VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranNotifyAccessNeighbourRelationMatrix

description: Notification to the OAM function of the potential relocation of the
GSM cell. The OAM function shall take further action.
Only used by NOTIFICATION.
BTS cell identity of the serving Cell-ID.
variables.name: VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranNotifyAccessSourceCellId

description: Notification to the OAM function of the voice QoS metrics for all
endpoint pairs.
The NOTIFICATIONs shall be sent periodically after every
'vanuSmartNetworkGeranModuleReportingPeriod'.
Each NOTIFICATION shall have voice QoS metrics for no more than 50
endpoint pairs. As many NOTIFICATIONs MAY be sent as needed to cover
all endpoint pairs present in the period.
The voice QoS metrics is reset every
'vanuSmartNetworkGeranModuleReportingPeriod'. Thus, the voice QoS
metrics are no older than the said period. An endpoint pair shall
find itself in an iteration period only if there are voice QoS metrics
in the iteration.

event.Summary: Voice QoS metrics reset on $v1. Metrics: Jitter (Max: $v3, Min: $v2) and Loss (Max: $v5, Avg: $v6)

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkVoiceQosMonitorNotification VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsTimestamp s EXAMPLEE VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsMinJitter u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsMaxJitter u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsAverageJitter u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsMaxLoss u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsAverageLoss u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsAverageBandwidth u 9999 VANU-SMART-NETWORK-GERAN-MIB::vanuSmartNetworkGeranVoiceQosStatsTotalOctetsCount C 9999

description: The maximum loss measured/reported in percent.
